title: About
body:
We.js have features like pages, posts, messenger, users, categories, tags, groups, notifications, administrative interface, ACL and suport to extensions with plugins and themes.

Links:

  • We.js site: http://wejs.org
  • Github main repo: https://github.com/wejs/we

Copyright and license

Copyright 2013-2015 Alberto Souza alberto.souza.dev@gmail.com and contributors , under the MIT license.

title: Instalation
body:
1 - install dependencies:

  • Mysql http://www.mysql.com/ ( for data storage )
  • Node.js http://nodejs.org/
  • npm https://npmjs.org/
  • graphicsmagick http://www.graphicsmagick.org/ ( for image resize )

2 - Install we.js CLI globaly:

npm install we yo generator-wejs -g

3 - Generate one project with yeoman:

yo wejs:blog

4 - Run install script:

Enter in your new project folder.

5 - Run install script:

we install -u

6 - Start project with:

node .
